decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (001 P1 - received 07/12/2017. 104 P1, 103 P1, 102 P1, 101 P1, 100 P1 - received 11/12/2018. 120 P1 - received 08/02. Environment Agency Flood Risk Matrix - received 03/01/2018. 211 P2, 210 P2, 202 P2, 201 P2 - received 07/02/2018. 203 P3 - received 08/02/2018.   220 P4 - received 20/02/2018) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 4 - The new flank window at first floor level is to be obscurely glazed and fixed to a minimum height of 1.7m from floor level and retained as such.
description: Erection of a single storey rear infill extension, increase in height of existing rear extension, two front roof windows, insertion of side window at first floor level and replacement double-glazed timber sash windows to the front and rear elevations (amended description).
